alert.note: Alert for Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 30 at 6:46PM CDT until May 31 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and northwest Missouri, including the following counties, in northeast Kansas, Doniphan. In northwest Missouri, Holt. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 646 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of East Central Doniphan and Southeastern Holt Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
